channel.title: clojure-for-java-developer on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in clojure-for-java-developer on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Brown-bag session and Dojo: Beginning Clojure
item.description: At a client, today I’ve facilitated a brown-bag session introducing the Clojure language to a group of java programmers. I’ve started hands-on, live coding on a REPL. To make things easier, I’ve created a maven project that imports the clojure jar and lets you obtain dependencies from clojars. The repo is here. This repo wouldn’t have been possible without the clojure maven plugin, written by Mark Derricutt. I’ve more or less followed this guide
